heading: Elemental Constellation Sorcerer Endgame Build Guide
content: Welcome to the Elemental Constellation Sorcerer Endgame Guide! This build aims to exploit the new to its fullest potential. With the right setup this tiny little elemental dagger firing off every 3 seconds with a light fart noise can deal absolutely insane amounts of damage. Unfortunately the build doesn't do much damage without these daggers so it tends to do poorly in speedfarming content due to small AoE, random targeting, and low rate of fire. is the key item for any version of this build because it fixes both random targeting and small AoE issues of . Without it, this aspect can only serve as a little bit of supplementary damage against bosses and such. Raiment also highly incentivizes us to use which makes this build somewhat palatable in speedfarming. There's a lot of different ways to stack . In this guide we focus on two of them. Starter setup uses . Combined with Double Fire Bolt Projectiles temper, this item casts 6 extra every time you cast one. The advantage of this setup is that it doesn't require anything else to get it running just one (with any roll) and 1 weapon temper.
